400 Bad Request, The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax. The request requires user authentication. The response MUST include a WWW-Authenticate header field. The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it. 404 Not Found, The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI. The method specified in the Request-Line is not allowed for the resource identified by the Request-URI. 408 Your request timed out. Please retry the request. The server is refusing to process a request because the request entity is larger than the server is willing or able to process. The server is refusing to service the request because the Request-URI is longer than the server is willing to interpret. 500 Internal server error, The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request. 504 Gateway timeout,The server was acting as a gateway or proxy and did not receive a timely response from the upstream server. An unknown error occurred
No location detected. Make sure location is enabled on the device.
Location permission is needed for core functionality Permission was denied, but is needed for core functionality. Settings

ProductListLoaded Product list loaded successfully.
ProductDetails_%s product.name Product viewed successfully.
AddToCart Product add to cart successfully.
Checkout Checkout screen viewed successfully.
PlaceOrder The user fills out all fields with valid data and proceeds to place order.
Payment_Success Payment successfully done.
This app crashed because it failed to parse the json response that was sent by the server. Maximum available stock size is 1 and the quantity added by the user is > 1 , an exception will be generated and the user will not be able to add it to the cart.
Payment_Failed The provided credit card number is invalid, resulting in payment failure. We apologize for the inconvenience, but we cannot accept payments in France.
app freezer still in sleep mode A user wants to crash the app in order to test it A user wants to generate the exception in order to test it
